parameters.name: DBInstanceMode
parameters.description:
The resource type of the instance. Valid values:

*   **StorageElastic**: elastic storage mode.
*   **Serverless**: Serverless mode.

parameters.name: DBVersion
parameters.description: The minor version number that does not include the prefix.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~86912~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the instance belongs. For information about how to obtain the ID of a resource group, see [View basic information of a resource group](~~151181~~).
